title: The Beginning
description: You wake up in a mysterious forest, unsure of how you got here. The air is fresh, but an eerie silence fills the space around you.

choices.name: Climb the nearby tree to get a better view

hint: The path may lead to answers, but a higher vantage point could reveal hidden details.

title: The Whispering Path
description: As you walk along the path, you hear faint whispers in the distance. The trees sway gently, though there is no wind.

choices.name: Ignore the whispers and keep walking

hint: Some secrets are meant to be uncovered, but caution is always wise.

title: A View from Above
description: You climb the tree and get a better view of your surroundings. In the distance, you see a cabin and a shimmering lake.

choices.name: Make your way to the lake

hint: A shelter might offer clues, but water sources attract life.

title: The Ghostly Murmurs
description: You follow the whispers and discover an ancient stone circle, where ghostly figures seem to be reenacting a ritual.
hint: Ancient places hold mysteries, but also dangers.

title: The Endless Path
description: You ignore the whispers and continue walking, but the path seems to stretch endlessly. You feel as if you're walking in circles.

choices.name: Mark a tree and walk further
Turn back to where you started

hint: Repeating patterns can be broken with awareness.
